title: Movie Match – Movie Recommendation Engine
description: A machine learning-based movie recommender that analyzes metadata and computes similarity scores to suggest relevant titles. Implements content-based filtering using cosinesimilarity, with a responsive web interface built in gradio.

title: Heart Disease Prediction Model
description: Eveloped an interactive web application using Streamlit that collects key healthparameters and predicts heart-disease risk using a Logistic Regression model. Performed datapreprocessing and model evaluation to build a reliable Logistic Regression classifier that deliversaccurate, real time heart-disease risk assessments for users.

title: HealthHub– Online Healthcare Platform
description: HealthHub is a comprehensive online healthcare platform offering timely healthtips, interactive tools, insightful blogs, and global health statistics. Key features include a BMIcalculator, real-time COVID-19 updates, and informative articles designed to support users inmaintaining a healthy lifestyle.
